description:
Haruka is a Pokemon Coordinator from Petalburg City. Starting off her journey, Haruka did not like Pokemon very much. She originally wanted to be a Pokemon Trainer so she could travel and see the world. On the day she got her starter Pokemon, http://anidb.net/ch23625 [Achamo], Haruka met Satoshi and like Kasumi was impressed by Satoshi`s personality. She traveled with Satoshi, her brother Masato and Takeshi until she decided to part ways an compete in the Johto region.
Having decided to focus on being a Pokemon Coordinator instead of a Pokemon Trainer, Haruka experience great success during the many Contests she entered. She has competed in the Kanto and Houen Grand Festivals as well as the Wallace Cup where she reached the finals only to loose to Hikari.
Haruka is also popular with the fanboys for her well endowed feminine body features. She isn`t shy about showing off her body as well by posing in her various swimming attire.
name: Haruka
